resources.string: Hello, you can use this application to check your skills on temperature conversion, or caculate the correct value.

string.name: answer1
string.item: Bravo! the temperature %1$s C, is indeed %2$s F

resources.string: Oops! your answer is wrong, you may tray again.

string.name: answer3
string.item: The temperature %1$s F, is converted to %2$s C

string.name: answer4
string.item: The temperature %1$s C, is converted to %2$s F
